title: Noob who's keen for practice tool
body: As a fairly new player to LoL, i just wanted to express how keen i am for this upcoming season!! I joined only a couple of months ago, have been maining Corki, and have been playing a little bit of Shyvana as well {{champion:42}} {{champion:102}} . I've tried a few other characters, with not much success, and i'm REALLY looking forward to the practice tool. It will give us new players a chance to try new characters, learn how their abilities work and get a better feel for the different play styles before going into a match! I can already see myself trying new roles and characters over the next couple of months, and then hopefully giving solo que a try once i'm more comfortable with a few characters and roles! if anyone has any other tips on how to get a better feel for this game, hit me up :-)
